functions.description: Export SQLite query result to CSV or XLSX file
functions.name: EXPORTQUERY

parameters.description: SQLite query to execute
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Include headers in the result (true/false)
parameters.name: incHeaders

parameters.description: Optional workbook path (uses current workbook if empty)
parameters.name: databaseName

parameters.description: Show error messages for debugging (true/false)
parameters.name: debugging

parameters.description: Export type: "csv" or "xls"
parameters.name: exportType

parameters.description: Optional name of the exported file (default: "ExportedQuery")
parameters.name: fileName

parameters.description: Optional range reference to ensure calculation dependencies
parameters.name: prerequisiteRange

functions.description: Refresh THREDr Table - Loads data from Excel range into the database
functions.name: REFRESHTABLE

parameters.description: The Excel range data to load (2D array)
parameters.name: tableData

parameters.description: Name to give the table in the database
parameters.name: tableName

parameters.description: Optional workbook path (uses current workbook if empty)
parameters.name: databaseName

parameters.description: Optional range reference to ensure calculation dependencies
parameters.name: prerequisiteRange

functions.description: Run SQLite query on THREDr database
functions.name: QUERY

parameters.description: SQLite query to execute
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Include headers in the result (true/false)
parameters.name: incHeaders

parameters.description: Optional workbook path (uses current workbook if empty)
parameters.name: databaseName

parameters.description: Show error messages for debugging (true/false)
parameters.name: debugging

parameters.description: Optional name to save this query as a view
parameters.name: queryDefinition

parameters.description: Return the query definition name instead of data (true/false)
parameters.name: returnDefinition

parameters.description: Return row count instead of data (true/false)
parameters.name: returnRows

parameters.description: Optional range reference to ensure calculation dependencies
parameters.name: prerequisiteRange

functions.description: Run SQLite query on THREDr database (Volatile version - recalculates frequently)
functions.name: VOLATILEQUERY

parameters.description: SQLite query to execute
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Include headers in the result (true/false)
parameters.name: incHeaders

parameters.description: Optional workbook path (uses current workbook if empty)
parameters.name: databaseName

parameters.description: Show error messages for debugging (true/false)
parameters.name: debugging

parameters.description: Optional name to save this query as a view
parameters.name: queryDefinition

parameters.description: Return the query definition name instead of data (true/false)
parameters.name: returnDefinition

parameters.description: Return row count instead of data (true/false)
parameters.name: returnRows

parameters.description: Optional range reference to ensure calculation dependencies
parameters.name: prerequisiteRange

functions.description: Displays the current time on a regular interval.
functions.name: CLOCK

parameters.description: Update interval in seconds (default: 1 second)
parameters.name: intervalSeconds

functions.description: API Call function - Makes HTTP requests and optionally loads data into database
functions.name: APICALL

parameters.description: API URL to call
parameters.name: url

parameters.description:
Optional table processing: 
- Empty/null: Returns JSON formatted as tree-style Excel layout
- 'auto' or 'table': Auto-converts JSON to Excel table format
- 'alltables': Loads all arrays in JSON to database tables
- Specific name: Extracts that property from JSON response
parameters.name: tableName

parameters.description: Optional workbook path (uses current workbook if empty)
parameters.name: databaseName

parameters.description: Optional range reference to ensure calculation dependencies
parameters.name: prerequisiteRange

parameters.description: Optional API name prefix for tables
parameters.name: apiName

parameters.description: Cache timeout in seconds (default: 600 = 10 minutes)
parameters.name: cacheTimeoutSeconds

functions.description: Advanced API Call function - Supports prompt, API key, secret, and token caching.
functions.name: APICALLADV

parameters.description: API endpoint URL (e.g., Hugging Face model endpoint)
parameters.name: url

parameters.description: The prompt or input for the API
parameters.name: prompt

parameters.description: The API key (e.g., Hugging Face token)
parameters.name: apiKey

parameters.description:
Optional table processing: 
- Empty/null: Returns JSON formatted as tree-style Excel layout
- 'auto' or 'table': Auto-converts JSON to Excel table format
- 'alltables': Loads all arrays in JSON to database tables
- Specific name: Extracts that property from JSON response
parameters.name: tableName

parameters.description: Optional secret or password for authentication
parameters.name: secret

parameters.description: Optional workbook path (uses current workbook if empty)
parameters.name: databaseName

parameters.description: Optional range reference to ensure calculation dependencies
parameters.name: prerequisiteRange

parameters.description: Optional API name prefix for tables
parameters.name: apiName

parameters.description: Cache timeout for token in seconds (default: 3600)
parameters.name: cacheTimeoutSeconds

functions.description: Custom worksheet function to import CSV data into the SQLite database.
functions.name: IMPORTCSV

parameters.description: The path to the CSV file.
parameters.name: filePath

parameters.description: The name of the table to create.
parameters.name: tableName

parameters.description: Additional criteria for filtering or processing (currently unused).
parameters.name: criteria

parameters.description: The path to the workbook (used as the database key).
parameters.name: databaseName

functions.description: Sum field from SQLite database based on criteria
functions.name: SUMFIELD

parameters.description: Table name to sum from
parameters.name: tableName

parameters.description: Field name to sum
parameters.name: fieldName

parameters.description: Optional WHERE clause for filtering
parameters.name: whereClause

parameters.description: Optional workbook path (uses current workbook if empty)
parameters.name: databaseName

parameters.description: Show error messages for debugging (true/false)
parameters.name: debugging

parameters.description: Table name to lookup from
parameters.name: tableName

parameters.description: Field name to return
parameters.name: returnField

parameters.description: WHERE clause for matching
parameters.name: whereClause

parameters.description: Optional workbook path (uses current workbook if empty)
parameters.name: databaseName

parameters.description: Show error messages for debugging (true/false)
parameters.name: debugging

functions.description: Get list of tables in the database
functions.name: GETTABLELIST

parameters.description: Optional workbook path (uses current workbook if empty)
parameters.name: databaseName

functions.description: Returns the current build version timestamp.
functions.name: BUILDVERSION
